binding:binding.name: SynologyAudioStation Binding
binding:binding.description: This is the binding for SynologyAudioStation.
binding:binding.author: Stefan Wunsch

parameter.name: url
parameter.label: URL
parameter.description: URL of the Synology NAS hosting the Audio Station including the protocol (e.g. http://192.168.1.2)

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: Port to access the Web API of the Synology NAS (5000 is the default for http)

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: Password of the user on the Synology NAS (two factor authentication is not supported)

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh interval
parameter.description: Interval for refreshing the data in seconds (0=disabled)
